name: Lost with the Ghost (GGJ21)
description:
Game made in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2021

Lost with the Ghost is a multiplayer game, divided by two teams. One it's made up of ghosts and the other kids.
Each team can move in all directions, but only the ghost can get through the doors and taking shortcuts to chase down the kids, who can put signs on the trees to guide their team to find the key and escape together.

The game requires at least three players to start. At least 2 players in the kids team and one in the ghosts team.

Team
Marco Elizondo - Programmer & Technical Artist
Yózdel Alanís - 3D Artist
Elizabeth Guerrero - 2D Artist

Music: Scary & Mystical Music Pack by Andrey Sitkov
SFX: Pro Sound Collection by Gamemaster Audio
SFX: Ultimate Sound FX by Sidearm Studios
Font: Nightmare Before Christmas by Film Himmel and Jens R. Ziehn

It uses Photon PUN free tier, so the game can only be played up to 20 players at the same time.
